### Code Coverage

| Type | Reviewers |
| ---- | --------- |
| Concept ACK | [fanquake](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28348#issuecomment-1715710588) |

If your review is incorrectly listed, please react with ð to this comment and the bot will ignore it on the next update.
<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#28210](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28210) (build: Bump clang minimum supported version to 13 by maflcko)
* [#25972](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25972) (build: no-longer disable WARN_CXXFLAGS when CXXFLAGS is set by fanquake)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

<!--cf906140f33d8803c4a75a2196329ecb-->

We should keep this, otherwise we won't have `-Wsuggest-override` turned on.
```bash
AX_CHECK_COMPILE_FLAG([-Wsuggest-override], [WARN_CXXFLAGS="$WARN_CXXFLAGS -Wsuggest-override"], [], [$CXXFLAG_WERROR])
```
Clang might still warn via on-by-default `-Winconsistent-missing-override`, but GCC wont produce anything.
diff_hunk:
@@ -447,10 +447,6 @@ if test "$CXXFLAGS_overridden" = "no"; then
   AX_CHECK_COMPILE_FLAG([-Wduplicated-cond], [WARN_CXXFLAGS="$WARN_CXXFLAGS -Wduplicated-cond"], [], [$CXXFLAG_WERROR])
   AX_CHECK_COMPILE_FLAG([-Wlogical-op], [WARN_CXXFLAGS="$WARN_CXXFLAGS -Wlogical-op"], [], [$CXXFLAG_WERROR])
   AX_CHECK_COMPILE_FLAG([-Woverloaded-virtual], [WARN_CXXFLAGS="$WARN_CXXFLAGS -Woverloaded-virtual"], [], [$CXXFLAG_WERROR])
-  dnl -Wsuggest-override is broken with GCC before 9.2
-  dnl https://gcc.gnu.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=78010
-  AX_CHECK_COMPILE_FLAG([-Wsuggest-override], [WARN_CXXFLAGS="$WARN_CXXFLAGS -Wsuggest-override"], [], [$CXXFLAG_WERROR],

body:
Ah sorry, I wrongly assumed this *disables* the check. However, it seems to be using `AC_LANG_SOURCE` to *enable* it. I presume the correct fix would be to just remove the `AC_LANG_SOURCE` and unconditionally enable it?

Will do that now.
diff_hunk:

   AX_CHECK_COMPILE_FLAG([-Woverloaded-virtual], [WARN_CXXFLAGS="$WARN_CXXFLAGS -Woverloaded-virtual"], [], [$CXXFLAG_WERROR])

body: (also reverted the changes to the leveldb buildfile, because they still seem to be needed for gcc 13.2)
